Parameter.Label: Delay before accept of Basic Set Off
Parameter.Help: Delay, from the time the siren-strobe turns on, before the Basic Set Off command is accepted. This could be used, for example, to avoid the situation where an associated window/door sensor turns the SSA1 alarm on and then immediately off when the window/door is opened and then quickly closed. -128 seconds - -1 seconds -> Interpreted as unsigned integer for negative values sent in set command.
